metadata.title: Alexander Peev | React Developer Portfolio
metadata.description: Explore Alexander Peev's React development projects, process, and services tailored for modern web applications.

hero.headline: Developer with
hero.subheadline: Working a 9-5 as a React Web Developer while also supporting and developing company and client websites.
hero.imageAlt: Image of Alexander Peev with a confident smile

process.title: Working together
process.description: We partner closely to understand your goals, design the solution, and ship production-ready React applications.

steps.title: Discovery Session
steps.copy: Share your vision and requirements so we can align on scope and priorities.

steps.title: Design & Build
steps.copy: I prototype UI flows, build in React + TypeScript, and iterate quickly with your feedback.

steps.title: Deploy & Support
steps.copy: Launch confidently with testing, documentation, and ongoing support options.

portfolio.title: Selected projects
portfolio.description: A snapshot of products I've shipped for startups and established teams across SaaS, e-commerce, and internal tooling.

projects.name: SaaS Analytics Platform
projects.description: Interactive dashboards that help operators monitor real-time metrics and automate alerts.
projects.imageAlt: Analytics dashboard mockup with rising line chart

projects.name: E-commerce Launchpad
projects.description: Headless commerce storefront with dynamic content, checkout flows, and subscription billing.
projects.imageAlt: E-commerce storefront mockup with product cards and checkout

about.title: About Alexander
about.copy: I'm a React developer based in Sofia, Bulgaria focused on building polished, resilient interfaces that feel effortless to use.

values.title: Custom Solutions
values.description: Every project is designed around your product metrics, brand, and growth plans.

values.title: Reliable Delivery
values.description: Transparent timelines, async updates, and fast iteration keep launches on track.

values.title: Performance Minded
values.description: Built with modern tooling, accessibility, and lighthouse checks baked in.

values.title: Security First
values.description: Implementing best practices for auth, API communication, and infrastructure.

contact.title: Let's build something great
contact.description: Share your project details and let's explore how we can collaborate to ship your next release.

form.messagePlaceholder: Tell me about the scope, timeline, and goals.

cards.title: Book a intro call
cards.description: Grab a 30-minute slot to discuss goals, timelines, and next steps.

cards.title: Say hello
cards.description: Reach out on LinkedIn or email and I'll respond within one business day.

hero.headline: Help build products teams rely on every day
hero.subheadline: I partner with companies that care deeply about craftsmanship, accessibility, and resilient web platforms.
hero.imageAlt: Illustration of Alexander Peev collaborating with a product team

items.title: Frontend leadership
items.description: Lead React architecture decisions, mentor engineers, and unblock delivery across squads.

items.title: Product collaboration
items.description: Translate roadmap goals into shipping milestones with PMs, designers, and stakeholders.

items.title: Quality obsessed
items.description: Type-safe codebases, testing routines, and accessibility baked into every release.

items.title: Remote ready
items.description: Comfortable with async-first workflows, documentation culture, and distributed teams.

roles.title: Roles I'm exploring
roles.description: I'm actively speaking with teams for mid-to-senior React positions where I can ship impactful product experiences.

positions.title: Senior React Engineer
positions.summary: Own front-of-the-frontend architecture, drive design systems, and mentor teammates.

positions.title: Lead Frontend Engineer
positions.summary: Partner with product leadership to deliver new verticals and scale engineering practices.

steps.title: Intro chat
steps.copy: Tell me about your team, roadmap, and what success looks like in the first six months.

steps.title: Technical deep dive
steps.copy: We review your stack, challenges, and outline a plan for improving DX and product velocity.

steps.title: Working session
steps.copy: Collaborate on a real scenario so we can evaluate fit, collaboration style, and expectations.

points.title: Outcome driven
points.description: Measure impact through product metrics, not just ticket counts.

points.title: Transparent communication
points.description: Clear async updates, documentation, and proactive stakeholder alignment.

points.title: Continuous improvement
points.description: Always iterating on tooling, processes, and team rituals to keep quality high.

cta.title: Hiring or partnering?
cta.description: Let's discuss how I can support your product roadmap, mentor your team, and deliver polished web experiences for your customers.

accessibility.primaryCta: Email Alexander Peev to introduce your company

bio.name: Alexander Peev, 25
bio.title: React Developer
bio.summary: React Developer with experience delivering AI-assisted interfaces, e-commerce platforms, and modern web applications for global brands.

skills.title: Core Skills
skills.intro: Tooling and capabilities that support high-impact product teams.

roles.title: React Developer
roles.description: Building React applications with TypeScript, React Query, and Chakra UI to integrate AI features for image generation and chat experiences.
highlights: Leading feature development across multiple React apps.
Integrating AI services for automation and personalization.
Driving UI consistency with shared component libraries.

roles.title: Fullstack Developer
roles.description: As a web developer, I developed both back-end and front-end features, and the main technologies I used were JavaScript and React.
highlights: Worked on two e-commerce projects: SFRA application, and a React PWA Kit application.
Worked as a part of a multinational team while following the Scrum methodology.

roles.title: Fullstack Contract Developer
roles.description: As a contract developer, I work on diverse projects for different companies
highlights: Currently developing a showcase website for 'Metal Expert Ltd' using Next.js, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS.
Develop and support an e-commerce site for 'Escape Structures Ltd' using WordPress, jQuery, and PHP.
Create and support an e-commerce site for 'Sober Coins Ltd' using Shopify, Liquid, and JavaScript.

roles.title: University Assistant
highlights: Led courses in "Web Development with ASP.NET Core", "Desktop Applications with .NET", and "Programming Basics with C#"
Recorded YouTube tutorials in which people could follow me step by step as I built projects.

items.school: St. Cyril and St. Methodius University of Veliko Tarnovo
St. Cyril and St. Methodius University of Veliko Tarnovo

items.name: MERN TypeScript App
items.description: Full-stack application with authentication, authorization, and real-time features.

items.name: Next.js 14 Web App
items.description: Modern web application using Next.js 14, Tailwind CSS, and PostgreSQL.

services.title: How I Can Help
services.intro: Engagement models tailored to ship reliable, polished interfaces fast.

items.title: Product Engineering
items.description: Feature delivery for complex React applications with type safety, testing, and observability built-in.

items.title: Design System Stewardship
items.description: Codify UI foundations, document usage patterns, and accelerate adoption across squads.

items.title: Team Enablement
items.description: Mentor engineers, refine workflows, and establish best practices that unlock sustainable delivery.

testimonials.title: Testimonials
testimonials.intro: Recent feedback from partners who shipped with me.

items.quote: Alex consistently transforms product requirements into delightful experiences while keeping the codebase maintainable for the entire team.
items.name: Diana Petrova

items.quote: From accessibility budgets to release strategy, Alex brings clarity and structure that let us move faster without breaking quality.
items.name: Luka Marinov
